releaseNote.zh-cn:
与dev1相比:
  1. 修复 在大屏设备上，横屏时无法调整列表列数，且锁定在6列
  2. 修复 某些颜色异常
  3. 新增 播放列表快照: 追踪当前播放列表, 在列表被替换时记录并存储(重启应用后失效), 以供恢复, 仅存储最近的变化, 位于播放器菜单(播放列表历史)
  4. 翻译 更新俄语翻译(by ElinaAndreeva)
  5. 开发 重构播放队列管理器, 清理代码, 更新依赖, 使用VersionCatalog
releaseNote.en:
Compared with dev1:
  1. Fix: on large tablets, the number of list columns cannot be adjusted and locked to 6 columns when the screen is landscaped
  2. Fix: some color glitch
  3. New: playing queue snapshot: track the current queue, record and save when playing queue is entirety replaced (keep till app rebooted), only store recent changes, to recovery queues, goto player menu (playing queue history)
  4. Translation: updated Russian (by ElinaAndreeva)
  5. Development: refactor Queue Manager, clean up code, update dependencies, using Gradle VersionCatalog

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 打开歌曲详情时卡死
  2. 修复 搜索页面的文字图标在浅色主色调下对比度问题(部分修复)
  3. 新增 歌词功能总开关
  4. 改进 崩溃界面，区分崩溃与内部错误
  5. 改进 优化菜单
  6. 开发 清理代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: stuck when opening song details
  2. Fix: terrible contrast of the text and icon on Search Page when under light primary color (Partial Fix)
  3. Add: a general switch for all lyrics features
  4. Improve: Crash Report Page - to distinguish between crash and internal error
  5. Improve: menu
  6. Development: clean up code

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 因图片缓存配置错误而在主播放器出现的低像素图片
  2. 修复 扫描媒体对话框因加载结束前提前退出导致崩溃
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: Low pixel images appearing in the main player due to image cache policy misconfiguration
  2. Fix: Scan Media Dialog crashes if early exit before the loading finished
